# Load libraries

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(Seurat)
library(Matrix)
library(dplyr)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggExtra)
library(cowplot)
library(reticulate)
library(wesanderson)
use_python("/usr/bin/python3")

#Set ggplot theme as classic
theme_set(theme_classic())
```
